verses.text: By faith I see the day, That ends my woe, When I shall yield my gain O'er all my loss.
In the thick clouds of light, By faith I see A crown of glory bright, Prepared for me.
Oh! let me now behold That happy day, When sorrow, sin, and pain Shall flee away!
Oh! let me now behold The prize in view! And through the storms of life My way pursue.
Jesus, thou art my guide; Oh! steps attend, And keep me near thy side, Be thou my friend.
Be thou my shield and sun, Be thou my guard! And, when my work is done, My great reward.
